(Code, all the tiny bots...that's moding.  How tall is your Radister guy?  Is 
he over 100 ft tall?  If he's not, he'd have quite a hard time smashing 
through the Ark.  Oh, and mistake me if I'm wrong, but I'd think magically 
whisking the Radicons to the Ark, having them form Radistor, smashing through 
the Ark in a matter of seconds, and having them get Plintissa is one whopper 
of a mode)
